data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Talk about an article you recently read in a newspaper, magazine, or online.
data.answer: When it comes to the article I lately read, I would like to talk about one online article. I read this article when I was searching for material for my assignments two weeks ago. It is an inspiring article that discusses global warming and the environmental changes, and more importantly, how humankind has contributed to this damage, and finally, how to take further actions to protect our environment. Although it is not a new topic, that article highlights how significantly individuals' actions affect the global environment, which leads me to think about what I can do in my daily life for the sake of the environment. It is hard to decide whether it is good or bad news. The phenomenon mentioned in the articles includes degradation, deforestation, and air pollution, which seems like bad news. However, at the end part of the article, it also presents the hope to the readers that many organizations are working together to solve the problems. (163字)

options.content: Was it a good or bad news and why?
